attributes.action: Make it compulsory for foreign lorries entering the UK to be fitted with mirrors to remove blind spots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it is becoming common for foreign lorries to sideswipe overtaking cars due to their being in the drivers "blind spot",it should be compulsory for them to be fitted with extra mirrors on UK roads.
This would make a major, and cheap, contribution to road safety.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
